 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זִיו‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==brightness, splendour== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, perhaps loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***zîmu***</u></abbr>, chiefly of ***countenance***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB 252: Pr 152</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 732</sup> [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>ZK ii. 43</sup> [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]<sup>Lex. Syr. 93</sup>); — suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זִיוִי‎</span> [[Dan.4.33|Dan 4:33]] ***splendour*** of royalty; <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זִוֵהּ‎</span> [[Dan.2.31|Dan 2:31]] (of image); plural ***brightness*** of countenance: suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זִיוַי‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זיויך‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זִיוָךְ‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], [[Dan.5.10|Dan 5:10]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זִי֫וֺהִי‎</span> [[Dan.5.6|Dan 5:6]]; [[Dan.5.9|Dan 5:9]].
